name: 激速碰车
description:
This is A brand new car fighting game, in small random maps, through "A, D" key to control the movement of the car, "W" key control car jumps. Can be consumed by auto car collision with the enemy each other's health, as you progress through the game will also fall in the scene props, which is in danger of the ball. If the car accidentally hit it will drop a lot of blood, also can use when the adverse thorn ball to beat the enemy vehicles. And gain props fruit, when to eat it can restore the life value of the car. Learn to use a variety of props can easily win the game.
Whenever defeat an enemy vehicles, could get rich gold award, gold can be applied within the game store to buy props increase vehicles attributes, every time defeated enemy vehicles, the game difficulty will improve a grade.
